definition: Mt Tai 泰山[Tai4 Shan1] in Shandong/abbr. for Thailand

sentences.english: Can water of healthy atmosphere of wrinkled giant hyssop and Kang Taike eat together?
sentences.chinese: 藿香正气水和康泰克可以一起吃吗？

sentences.english: I've caught a cold. I want the cold tablets.
sentences.chinese: 当然可以，我给你拿最好的感冒药“康泰克”。

sentences.english: Objective To develop a simple, sensitive and rapid method for the determination of Tanshinone IIA in Naokangtai Capsules.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立脑康泰胶囊中丹参酮ⅡA的含量测定方法。

sentences.english: The company Conde Nast Publishing recently moved into offices there.
sentences.chinese: 康泰纳仕出版公司最近搬进了这栋楼里的办公室。

sentences.english: To be in a good mood, good things come, the body conde, full of happiness.
sentences.chinese: 心情愉快，好事自来，身体康泰，幸福满怀。

definition: Anda county level city in Suihua 綏化|绥化, Heilongjiang
Anle district of Keelung City 基隆市[Ji1 long2 shi4], Taiwan
Kangle county in Linxia Hui autonomous prefecture 臨夏回族自治州|临夏回族自治州[Lin2 xia4 Hui2 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Gansu
to accept a life of ease/to enjoy a comfortable retirement
flood of good fortune fills the heavens (idiom); a lucky sign
